text: Pound for Pound is the fifth studio album by Canadian heavy metal band Anvil, released in 1988. ==Track listing== All songs written by Anvil ;Side one #"Blood on the Ice" – 5:26 #"Corporate Preacher" – 4:07 #"Toe Jam" – 2:46 #"Safe Sex" – 3:22 ;Side two # * "Where Does All the Money Go?" – 4:06 #"Brain Burn" – 3:30 #"Senile King" – 4:05 #"Machine Gun" – 2:56 #"Fire in the Night" – 6:10 #"Cramps" – 0:12 ==Personnel== ;Anvil *Steve "Lips" Kudlow – vocals, lead guitar *Dave Allison – rhythm guitar *Ian Dickson – bass *Robb Reiner – drums ;Production *Paul Lachapelle – producer, engineer, mixing *Mel Berger – executive producer ==References== Category:1988 albums Category:Anvil (band) albums Category:Metal Blade Records albums Category:Enigma Records albums
title: Pound for Pound
